Welcome to gagepy’s documentation!¶

A Python package that processes and analyzes data files from U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) streamflow gages. The USGS streamflow gages provide water data across the United States. Streamflow gage data and corresponding data files can be found at the USGS National Water Information System (NWIS).
